cont.entity_a: Belt drive clogs with hair and is difficult to clean. Brush slips and stops turning with small resistance. Very difficult to self-replace the belt. Beater brush drive gear fails quickly due to design flaw. The motor for the brush drive belt died after limited use. Plastic pulley on motor shaft fails quickly. Brush roller stops working after moderate use. Brush motor stops working after short use. Brush roller stops working due to design issues. Brush stops spinning quickly under load.
cont.entity_b: Brush roller stops turning quickly. Belt-driven design is loud.

cont.entity_a: Good suction and convenient for cleaning stairs and crevices. Strong suction and durable over many years of use. Good suction but the design is flawed. Corded vacuum is powerful but not ideal for quick clean-ups.
cont.entity_b: Very noisy and suction is poor. Great suction for vacuuming horses. Suction is weak and hose mechanism is hard to use. Suction power is poor compared to older models. No filter means it doesn't lose suction. Loud but powerful for pet hair. Suction is poor through the hose. Hose has little suction power. Easy to store and strong suction. Powerful for small clean-ups but loud.

cont.entity_a: Caught on fire after short use. Beater bar stops rotating after one year. Hose broke and replacement is hard to find. Hose splits easily and requires replacement.
Warranty is not effective from the date of purchase.
Does not pick up dirt or hair effectively in cars. Good for stairs but lacks power for larger areas.
cont.entity_b: Hose and crevice tool are not effective. Design changes make it less effective than previous models.

cont.entity_a: Heavier than expected and exhaust blows towards the user. Vacuum is loud and heavy for prolonged use.
cont.entity_b: Vacuum is heavy and not suitable for vehicles. Useful for stairs but loud and heavy. Not recommended for vehicles due to bulkiness.

cont.entity_a: Powerful with a long cord, but hose is too short.
cont.entity_b: 20-foot cord allows for single plug-in use. Cord length is good for vacuuming stairs without extension. Cord is short, requiring extensions.

cont.entity_a: Vacuum is loud and heavy for prolonged use.
cont.entity_b: Very noisy and suction is poor. Requires hearing protection due to noise. Handy for small jobs but very loud. Loud but powerful for pet hair. Noisy but effective for upholstery and stairs. Powerful motor but very loud. Useful for stairs but loud and heavy. Powerful for small clean-ups but loud.

cont.entity_a: Toggle switch requires significant pressure to operate.
The vacuum overheats with extended use. Vacuum overheats quickly with use.

cont.entity_b: Easy to store and strong suction. Hose is convenient but vacuum is bulky.
